alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 01 at 2:22PM MDT until November 04 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches, with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...Western Uinta Mountains, Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs, Central Mountains and Southern Mountains. * WHEN...From noon Wednesday to midnight MDT Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions, especially for seasonal routes and mountain passes. Backcountry access will become treacherous and should be taken into consideration for hikers, hunters, and other recreators. Be prepared for traction restrictions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains
